Bamsoet: Pilkada Serentak 2020 Salah Satu Tugas Utama Kapolri Baru
02 Nov 2019, 09:24 by Uji Sukma Medianti
Jakarta - Ketua MPR RI Bambang Soesatyo meminta Kapolri Jenderal Idham Azis untuk segera mempersiapkan aparat kepolisian menghadapi berbagai perhelatan nasional yang akan dihadapi dalam waktu dekat ini.
Antara lain perayaan Natal 25 Desember 2019, Tahun Baru 1 Januari 2020, Idul Fitri Mei 2020, serta rangkaian Pilkada Serentak 2020 di 9 provinsi, 224 kabupaten dan 37 kota.
Aparat kepolisian harus mempersiapkan segala halnya sejak dini, dari mulai mental, strategi pencegahan kerusuhan, maupun penanganan masalah sosial lainnya yang berpotensi timbul akibat berbagai perhelatan tadi.
"Keamanan, ketertiban, dan kenyamanan masyarakat tak boleh terganggu oleh kondisi apapun serta oleh siapapun. Kepolisian harus responsif dan bertindak cepat dalam mencegah serta menangani berbagai kemungkinan yang terjadi. Dimulai dari damainya Natal 2019, nyamannya merayakan tahun baru 2020, lancarnya arus mudik idul fitri 2020, hingga kondusifnya Pilkada Serentak 2020. Kepolisian sudah harus memetakan strateginya dari sekarang," ujar Bamsoet dalam keterangan tertulis, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Pelantikan yang dipimpin Presiden Joko Widodo ini turut dihadiri Wakil Presiden Ma'ruf Amin, Ketua DPR RI Puan Maharani, Ketua Mahkamah Konstitusi Anwar Usman, Ketua Ketua Mahkamah Agung Hatta Ali, Kepala BIN Budi Gunawan, Ketua KPK Agus Raharjo, Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto serta sejumlah menteri Kabinet Indonesia Maju.
Ketua Umum Pemuda Pancasila ini memberikan catatan khusus terkait penyelenggaraan Pilkada Serentak 2020. Walaupun saat ini kondusifitas bangsa relatif sudah kondusif, namun Polri masih perlu terjun langsung ke masyarakat untuk bertemu para tokoh maupun organisasi kemasyarakatan untuk mengajak bersama-sama menyambut Pilkada dengan gembira. Jangan sampai pembelahan bangsa yang sempat terjadi pada Pemilu 2019 terulang kembali.
"Titik krusial Pilkada Serentak 2020 akan dimulai pada 28 April 2020 yang ditandai dengan pendaftaran calon pasangan Pilkada di KPU masing-masing daerah. Setelah itu akan ada kampanye dan berakhir dengan pemungutan dan penghitungan suara pada 23 September 2020. Para Kapolda hingga Kapolres yang daerahnya menyelenggarakan Pilkada perlu diberi pembekalan khusus sejak sekarang, sehingga nantinya bisa siap mengantisipasi berbagai kemungkinan yang terjadi," tutur Bamsoet.
Bamsoet juga menekankan agar sinergitas dan soliditas TNI-Polri yang selama ini sudah berjalan baik, harus lebih ditingkatkan. Dari mulai Kapolsek - Danramil, Kapolres - Dandim, Kapolda - Pangdam, hingga Kapolri - Panglima TNI harus memberikan contoh kepada para prajurit dan personilnya masing-masing.
"TNI dan Polri adalah anak kandung rakyat, penjaga kedaulatan dan keamanan Indonesia. Tanpa kerjasama keduanya, Indonesia tak akan bisa diselimuti kedamaian. Melihat track record Jenderal Idham Azis, seharusnya bukan hal sulit untuk menjadi teladan bagi personil kepolisian guna meningkatkan soliditas dan sinergitas dengan prajurit TNI," pungkas Bamsoet.

Bamsoet: 2020 simultaneous local elections One of the main tasks of the new police chief
02 Nov 2019, 09:24 by Uji Sukma Medianti
Jakarta - Indonesian MPR Chair Bambang Soesatyo asked National Police Chief Gen. Idham Azis to immediately prepare the police to face various national events that will be encountered in the near future.
These included the celebration of Christmas 25 December 2019, New Year 1 January 2020, Eid Al-Fitr in May 2020, and a series of Concurrent Pilkada 2020 in 9 provinces, 224 districts and 37 cities.
Police officers must prepare everything early on, starting from the mental, riot prevention strategies, and handling other social problems that have the potential to arise due to various events earlier.
"The security, order and comfort of the community must not be disturbed by any conditions or by anyone. The police must be responsive and act quickly in preventing and handling various possibilities that occur. Starting from the peace of Christmas 2019, the comfort of celebrating the new year 2020, the smooth flow of the Idul Fitri homecoming 2020, until the conducive simultaneous elections in 2020. The police have to map out their strategies from now on, "Bamsoet said in a written statement, Saturday (11/02/2019).
The inauguration led by President Joko Widodo was also attended by Vice President Ma'ruf Amin, Speaker of the Indonesian Parliament Puan Maharani, Chair of the Constitutional Court Anwar Usman, Chief Chairman of the Supreme Court Hatta Ali, Head of BIN Budi Gunawan, KPK Chairman Agus Raharjo, TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto as well as a number of Ministers of the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet.
The Chairman of the Pancasila Youth gave a special note related to the holding of the Simultaneous Regional Election in 2020. Although the national conducive situation is relatively conducive at present, the National Police still needs to go directly to the community to meet leaders and social organizations to invite together to welcome the Pilkada happily. Do not let the division of the nation that occurred in the 2019 General Election reoccur.
"The crucial point of the 2020 Simultaneous Local Election will begin on April 28, 2020, which will be marked by the registration of prospective regional election pairs in the KPU in each region. After that there will be a campaign and it ends with voting and vote counting on September 23, 2020. The Regional Police Chiefs up to the Regional Police Headquarters that held the regions "Local elections need to be given a special briefing from now on, so that later they can be ready to anticipate the various possibilities that occur," said Bamsoet.
Bamsoet also emphasized that the synergy and solidity of the TNI-Polri which had been running well had to be improved. From the start of the Kapolsek - Danramil, Kapolres - Dandim, Kapolda - Pangdam, to the Kapolri - TNI Commander must give examples to the soldiers and their respective personnel.
"TNI and Polri are biological children, guardians of Indonesia's sovereignty and security. Without the cooperation of both, Indonesia could not be shrouded in peace. Looking at the track record of General Idham Azis, it should not be difficult to set an example for police personnel to increase solidity and synergy with soldiers. TNI, "concluded Bamsoet.
